attributes.action: listen to the General Staff and members of the Armed Services and resource them fully. NOW.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is abundantly apparent to all objective observers that the Armed Forces in combat action are being failed by the lack of funds, staff and resources. This Government must adhere to the spirit of the covenenant between this great nation and its Service personnel and increase direct support immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
